dcterms:creator: Madhurananda Pahar
Igor Miranda
Andreas Diacon
Thomas Niesler
dcterms:description: A manually-annotated dataset containing approximately 6000 cough and 68000 non-cough events from 14 adult male patients in a tuberculosis clinic, captured using a smartphone's accelerometer and an external microphone.
dcterms:title: Manually-annotated dataset of cough and non-cough events

dcterms:creator: Madhurananda Pahar
Marisa Klopper
Robin Warren
Thomas Niesler
dcterms:description: A dataset containing cough and non-cough events from 14 adult male patients, used for COVID-19 cough classification using machine learning and global smartphone recordings.
dcterms:title: Cough and non-cough events from 14 adult male patients

dcterms:creator: Igor DS Miranda
Andreas H Diacon
Thomas R Niesler
dcterms:description: A cough detection dataset utilizing audio and accelerometer signals, used for a comparative study of features for acoustic cough detection.
dcterms:title: Cough detection dataset using audio and accelerometer signals

dcterms:creator: Jingqi Fan
German Comina
Robert Gilman
Jose Lopez
Brian H Tracey
dcterms:description: A cough monitoring system dataset that combines microphone and accelerometer measurements for monitoring pulmonary tuberculosis.
dcterms:title: Cough monitoring system dataset
